modShortDescription: BBBBilly has brought you a simple and practical mod - Disable Potted Plant. This simple mod can prevent potted plants from being made and picked up.
modDescription:
BBBBilly has brought you a simple and practical mod – Disable Potted Plant. This simple mod can prevent potted plants from being made and picked up, so as to prevent bad guy from using potted plants to commit crimes, such as using perspective bugs or shooting underground. This mod is very suitable for servers!

In fact, he doesn’t quite understand why The Fun Pimps don’t fix this bug?

His English is so poor! He hope you can understand what he’s talking about!

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=19TLy4W26Ltx4ua7Clr3P1aFjGq_OXE8O)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/23061-a19disable-potted-plant-save-your-server/).

**Credits:** [BBBBilly](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/bbbbilly/)
